entries.name: atype
entries.desc: Map from acceptable argument types to pattern and converter pairs.

entries.name: list
entries.desc: List of all switches and summary string.

entries.name: long
entries.desc: Map from long style option switches to actual switch objects.

entries.name: short
entries.desc: Map from short style option switches to actual switch objects.

entries.name: append(*args)
entries.desc: Appends switch at the tail of the list, and associates short, long and negated long options. Arguments are:

entries.name: complete(id, opt, icase = false, *pat, &block)
entries.desc: Searches list id for opt and the optional patterns for completion pat. If icase is true, the search is case insensitive. The result is returned or yielded if a block is given. If it isn't found, nil is returned.

entries.name: each_option(&block)
entries.desc: Iterates over each option, passing the option to the block.

entries.name: prepend(*args)
entries.desc: Inserts switch at the head of the list, and associates short, long and negated long options. Arguments are:

entries.name: search(id, key)
entries.desc: Searches key in id list. The result is returned or yielded if a block is given. If it isn't found, nil is returned.

entries.name: summarize(*args, &block)
entries.desc: Creates the summary table, passing each line to the block (without newline). The arguments args are passed along to the summarize method which is called on every option.
